metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45539 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: HAProxy before 2.8.2 accepts # as part of the URI component, which mightallow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information or have unspecifiedother impact upon misinterpretation of a path_end rule, such as routingindex.html#.png to a static server.

criterions.comment: haproxy package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
